snippet: Iranian nuclear negotiators said that they would give assurances on Tuesday in Geneva that Iran was not trying to assemble atomic weapons.
abstract: Iranian nuclear negotiators say they will offer three-step plan intended to persuade world powers that country's nuclear program is aimed at securing independence of Iran's civilian energy program and not an attempt to assemble atomic weapons.
lead_paragraph: Iranian nuclear negotiators said that they would give assurances on Tuesday in Geneva that Iran was not trying to assemble atomic weapons.

headline.main: Iran to Offer Proposal and Speak of Peaceful Aims at Nuclear Talks in Geneva
headline.print_headline: Iran to Offer Proposal and Speak of Peaceful Aims at Nuclear Talks in Geneva
